medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of fever, confusion, and lethargy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely in November 1998; patient exhibited fever, confusion, and lethargy without specified duration or intensity. The patient did not have ankle reflexes, and physical examination revealed a nodular liver.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Immunocompromised due to renal transplantation in 1989; taking immunosuppressant drugs (cyclosporine, prednisone, azathioprine). Had end-stage renal disease and polycystic kidney disease.
medical_history.social_history: Lived with family members; owned a pet Umbrella cockatoo for 7 years but was not involved in its care.
